Comment.value:
CONDITION: If Zamithra is 'awakened' by the player bashing or failing an Open Lock attempt on the container in her room.

ACTION: She wakes up the Witless Fighter and, together, they attack.
CONDITION: If Zamithra detects a pickpocket attempt against her.
Zamithra and her guards attack the PC.

ACTION: Zamithra gives the player the key to her room. Zamithra goes to her room and enters (leaving the door locked). She puts her clothing/armor and the Onyx gem into a locked container in her room, then climbs into bed and goes to sleep.

CONDITION: Zamithra is downstairs in the Green Griffon Inn. Player is in range. Witless Fighter is in range.

NOTE: The player is able to interrupt this at any time. If interrupted, Zamithra will just start up the conversation again a minute later.

ACTION: Tie this phrase into the generic tavern system and have the Witless Fighter order his own as well. Zamithra will wander the tavern for 60 seconds, then return the Witless Fighter and, if the player is still around, restart the conversation.
ACTION: Zamithra goes to her room, unlocks it, and enters. She puts her clothing/armor and the Onyx gem into a locked container in her room, then climbs into bed and goes to sleep.

ACTION: The Witless Fighter follows Zamithra to her room, locking the door behind him. He climbs into bed and goes to sleep as well.

NOTE: He can be interrupted with conversation along the way to Zamithra's room, thereby expanding the length of time that her door remains unlocked.
CONDITION: Zamithra wakes up in the morning and the Onyx gem isn't in her chest.
ACTION: Zamithra moves to the inn door and destroys self.

LinkComment.value:
CONDITION: Zamithra is downstairs in the Green Griffon Inn. Player is in range. Witless Fighter is in range.

NOTE: The player is able to interrupt this at any time. If interrupted, Zamithra will just start up the conversation again a minute later.
ACTION: This launches a gender-aligned, bench-clearing bar brawl amongst all patrons.

Comment.value: CONDITION: Witless fighter is not drunk.
